questId4.name: Astral Chord
questId4.description: The fabulous Astral Chord requires your assistance! Bring him 1000x Money, and he will reward you with 30 Super Mystery Boxes filled with surprise treasures!

questId7.name: Youhu
questId7.description: Youhu, the spirited girl, needs your help! Deliver her 500x Money, and in gratitude, she will present you with a Megaphone to amplify your messages and spread your word!

questId8.name: Flare Star Butterflies
questId8.description: The graceful Flare Star Butterflies require your assistance! Deliver 1x Life Entwined, and in return, receive 100x Mystery Boxes filled with delightful surprises!

questId9.name: Youhu
questId9.description: Youhu, seeks your help! She is looking to host an unforgettable celebration! She is preparing a grand festival and needs 5000x Money, 50x Mystery Boxes, and 2x Megaphones to make it truly spectacular. In return, she'll bestow upon you the prestigious Crown Title, a mark of honor that elevates your status among adventurers!

questId10.name: Sunroom Siesta
questId10.description: Sunroom Siesta is curious about the role of moderators! Share your insights on their responsibilities, and she will reward you with a generous ðŸ’° 50000x Money to support your journey.
questId10.questions: What is the job of a moderator?
questId10.answers: Moderators assist the Developer in managing the bot and oversee all Customer Support matters. They enforce the rules and punish those who breach them. Moderators are here to help with issues, answer questions, and ensure that users have a smooth experience. Do not disturb them with unnecessary or unrelated matters.
